headline: Wall Street Plays Long Game as Deals Go Private
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A KKR & Co. debt sale shows how far Wall Street is willing to go to keep leveraged underwriting business from slipping away to private credit after periods of turmoil.Most Read from BloombergAs Trump Reshapes Housing Policy, Renters Face Rollback of RightsA New Central Park Amenity, Tailored to Its East Harlem NeighborsIs Trump’s Plan to Reopen the Notorious Alcatraz Prison Realistic?What’s Behind the Rise in Serious Injuries on New York City’s Streets?NYC Warns of 17% Drop in For
